introduction: Go to https://brilliant.org/nutshell/ to dive deeper into these topics and more with a free 30-day t

vocabulary.definition: a thing with distinct and independent existence
vocabulary.example: The artificial superintelligence may become an entity with unprecedented power.

vocabulary.definition: to overcome and take control of a place or people
vocabulary.example: Humans used their intelligence to conquer new territories and environments.

vocabulary.definition: possessing intelligence far surpassing that of humans
vocabulary.example: A superintelligent AI could revolutionize the way we solve complex problems.

vocabulary.definition: to increase in speed or rate
vocabulary.example: The rate of AI progress is expected to accelerate with advancements in technology.

vocabulary.definition: to undermine the power and authority of an established system or institution
vocabulary.example: The AGI could subvert civilization if not carefully controlled and regulated.

vocabulary.definition: providing a deep and involving experience
vocabulary.example: The AI workshop offers an immersive learning environment for understanding complex technologies.
